name: Disney by Loungefly Crossbody Hocus Pocus Book
description:
Write the book on spellbinding style with our Loungefly Disney Hocus Pocus Book Crossbody Bag. This vintage "book" style crossbody bag features all kinds of bewitchingly fun details. On the front "cover," the Sanderson Sisters gather around the cauldron, and the words "Hocus Pocus" appear in gold-foil details. When you open the front flap, you'll see the words "Hocus Pocus" in gold as well. On the back, Billy Butcherson, Max Dennison, Allison, and Dani Dennison (who is wearing her trick-or-treat costume), gather at Old Burial Hill under a full moon and gold-foil detailed stars. In the dark, outlines and edges from the cauldron on the front and the moon on the back, glow. Shiny gold "binding" on the sides adds a nostalgic touch. Turn the pages of your own adventures with this frightfully fun accessory. Crossbody bag features include vegan leather (polyurethane), gold-colored metal hardware, adjustable shoulder straps, and applique, debossed, glow-in-the-dark, gold-foil, and printed details. Note the coordinating lining. This crossbody bag is an officially licensed Disney product. Crossbody bag dimensions: 9" W x 6" H x 2" D (Width is measured across the bottom of the bag.)

- Material: PU leather
- Size: 25 x 8 x 25 cm
